quiz.question: Which year did the Ottoman Empire capture Constantinople?
In what year did Israel declare independence, leading to the 1948 Arab-Israeli War?
What year did the Anglo-Saxon Chronicle first begin recording English history under King Alfred?
What year did the Black Death reach Europe, beginning its major pandemic wave?
In what year did the Battle of Stalingrad end, marking a turning point in WWII's Eastern Front?
When did the Sui Dynasty complete the Grand Canal, transforming Chinese internal trade routes?
Which year marks the end of World War II in Europe (VE Day)?
What year did the Treaty of Versailles formally end World War I?
Which year did the Battle of Hastings occur, leading to Norman rule in England?
In which year did Christopher Columbus first arrive in the Americas?
In what year did the Black Tuesday stock market crash that precipitated the Great Depression occur?
In what year was the Edict of Milan issued, granting religious toleration to Christians in the Roman Empire?
Which year did the Berlin Wall fall, symbolizing the end of Cold War divisions?
Which year did the Irish Potato Famine, a major demographic catastrophe, begin in earnest?
What year did the Norman conquest of southern Italy begin with Norman incursions?
